Reviews.Title: “Lower quality than Red Roof Inns, ok for one or two nights”

Reviews.Content: planning trip las vegas weeks ago noticed prices third fourth days stay checked tripadvisor trusted source found continental suites time sitting 9 hotels las vegas 29 night 2 nights 49 night figured chance weve las vegas half dozen times cheapest hotel route wed experiment pros booked balcony ours overlooked chapel door entertaining watch weddings especially halloween fridge entire stay parking available building free internet bonus town notorious charging strip cons overall hotel bit run stained carpets hallway nonfunctioning ice machine anyway towels hit miss tv dozen channels bed comfortable realized trip comforts travel nice bed top list skipped breakfast personally choose stay cant completely bash 29 49 night reviewers giving 5 5 bit overzealous wouldnt 1 5 pay

Reviews.Content: nights halloween weekend hoot third floor balcony overlooking viva las vegas wedding chapel entertaining own rite 60 night total sat sun mon bed bath beyond perfectly clean office attentive staff wifi breakfast poor cereal toast coffee thats fridge microwave coffee pot ok size walk mile fremont street highly recommended ambiance town square party feel prefer strip easily walk north strip gawking week weekday price 45 total super deal nights vegas

Reviews.Title: “Great value and downtown experience!”
Reviews.Author: millieboo
Reviews.Content: staff faultless couldnt help found fine view viva las vegas wedding chapel bonus safe comfortable walk youre confident streetwise dont mind seeing vegas maybe expecting vegas strip luxury preferred downtown freemont experience 15minute walk safe walking anytime day night value money staff cleanliness superb prepared night music tattoo parlour road nice coffee breakfast fine usually run butter sugar 830am dont replaced muffins saturday morning enjoy definately stay cant wait balcony truly appreciate downtown atmospher yes music night added vegas experience total bargain superb customer service faultless

Reviews.Title: “Overwhelmingly disappointed”
Reviews.Author: Mommy_AB
Reviews.Content: begin attracted hotel price rated 9 300 hotels las vegas realized 20 reviews management probably wrote bring business reading reviews staying im thinking theyre theyre talking hotel prices tripadvisor accurate hotel rated 9 gross towels washcloths multiple black hairs extra pillow brought bathroom smelled carpet looked pretty clean shower walked bed feet dirty people night walking talking floors creaked step heard word werent ridiculously loud floors thin kept awake couple hours parking lot tiny parking spots spots themselves close hardly car scratching ones adjacent parking lot vacant lot garbage dumps overflowing trash ice ice machine homeless guy living stairwells prostitutes drug dealers street outside getting picture overall creepy dirty feeling poor little 5 niece scared mind didnt blame bit call spoiled stay

Reviews.Title: “Good, clean, convenient”

Reviews.Content: stayed continental suites overnight attracted reasonable rates staying mega hotelcasino continental suites looking clean cheap convenient plenty parking recently renovated stay

Reviews.Content: business trip las vegas greati stayed continental suites staff friendly polite clean specially love nice night close strip strongly recommend planing trip stay continental suites

Reviews.Content: hotel newly remodeled clean write review hotel looking stay vegas hard time finding price range close center strip surprised nice intimate hotel low price strip minutes wynn bellagio necessities people front especially lena price definitely worth stay

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Inexpensive, friendly staff and greatly convenient”
Reviews.Author: Sam B
Reviews.Content: wife stay strip close downtown las vegas found continental suites impressed hotel remodeled price top didnt pay internet stayed 3 pleasant nights staff hotel courteous helpful definitely recommend affordable clean free breakfast
